website_summaries.verdict: A compact and dense foot roller massager that you can bring to the office, gym and other locations.
pros: Textured foam surface helps improve blood circulation in the feet
Has been shown to help improve flexibility and address minor issues in the feet
Backed by a one-year manufacturer's warranty
cons: Massager's surface may be too hard and rigid for some users

customer_reviews.title: High quality roller, feet pain be gone!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a game-changer for my feet pain (plantar fasciitis). I spent about 5 minutes on each foot for a few days in a row and feel a huge difference in the stress on my heel/arch area. The product itself is of a very high quality and I'm glad I splurged a bit over the generic wooden rollers. I got the "Extra Firm" and find that it still has a little give in the rubber-material, but enough that it certainly "hurts in a good way" while using it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. It's more helpful for my plantar fasciitis than anything else I've tried. I work in a physical therapy studio so I've tried everything and this is the winner! As soon as we got them at work and I tried it, I was sold immediately and purchased one for home. My only complaint is that it's impossible to use on hard floors because the part that touches the floor is hard plastic so it slides instead of rolls. It needs a silicone band or something to give it some grip. I added a strip of a nice grippy gaffer tape around this part so we can use it anywhere, not just on a rug or carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Marie

customer_reviews.title: I am utterly amazed. I have not had a pain free morning ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the recommendation of a friend who is a Physical Therapist. She knew a marathon runner (!) with the same foot conditions as me (plantar fasciitis, neuromas). This person iced her feet and used the nano-roller when training. Since I wanted to jog more but was afraid what increased wear and tear would do to my feet, I decided to try it. The last two nights, I rolled the trigger point massager under my feet for about 40 minutes. This morning when I got out of bed, I was able to walk without pain. I am utterly amazed. I have not had a pain free morning in years, due to the plantar fasciitis. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paniculture

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not extra firm.
customer_reviews.text: It says "extra firm" density, and its just not. It is a more firm foam compared to something the density of a marshmallow, but the only thing firm about this roller is the plastic rod is the middle of it which is the only thing I really feel, and its not thick or sturdy enough to accomplish anything. And it flexes a lot. Feels like its about to break. I'd get one of the solid rubber rollers instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on carpeted surface.  Not so much on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: The TriggerPoint Nano does exactly what I need it to do, which is massage out my plantar fasciatis. I don't recommend this product if you're using it on hard surfaces as the wheels are too slippery to gain traction. This product works great on carpeted floors.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Expensive piece of useless plastic
customer_reviews.text: Wow. After reading all of the great reviews I had high expectations for this product. Alas, it turned out to be an expensive, useless piece of plastic that doesn't even remotely feel like a massage from human hands. In fact, it's actually a bit painful to use.
customer_reviews.author: SunCoastKid

customer_reviews.title: Handy for massager.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of all of these products. I have suffered from planters fasciitis in the past and this feels amazing. I might like this better if the rollers on the end were square so it would stay in one place as I use it. A minor complaint. The "foam" material is very firm, but also a little flexible. I only recommend using it with socks on to prevent yucky batteries from feet getting in it. I'm sure it's easy to clean if need be, but that is a personal preference. This has truly made my feet feel better after a long run. Highly recommend all of trigger point products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding foot roller with an innovative design.
customer_reviews.text: I developed chronic plantar fasciitis back in the day and used smooth foot rollers that only stretched the thick band of tissue running across the bottom of the foot whereas this foot roller will also offer an excellent deep tissue massage to the surrounding areas; however, because of the raised surface it may take some getting used to. I recommend applying light pressure to start before becoming more aggressive.
customer_reviews.author: Runvet

customer_reviews.title: Good but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I used this to recover from a plantar fasciitis. "Wheels" -at the end are attached by bolts which loosened making it much less effective. I was past Amazon Warrenty and triggerpoint don't make it easy to connect with them. Works well when it works but I'd struggle to recommend. I've bought single construction roller for continued treatment.
customer_reviews.author: MaMu

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool to relieve pain and help soreness.
customer_reviews.text: If you have pain in your feet from standing too long, this helps out a lot. I don't know about having medical issues but if you're sore from workouts, running, being overweight, or just plain standing at work, this thing is a blessing. It helps my feet recover sooner from soreness and it feels pretty good while I use it. If you have small enough legs, you can use it on your calves and thighs too. I'm a big guy so I use it on feet, arms, calves, and top of my legs. Can't use it on my hamstrings. Would recommend as a pain reliever and sore muscle recovery. Just don't expect miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Kakashi

customer_reviews.title: Consider it an Investment
customer_reviews.text: What an outstanding product! I was hesitate about the price and if it would work well. I leave the roller under my computer table and use it frequently and -- wow!-- it is great. As a Chef and a Schoolteacher my feet are very important tools in my work life. This roller eases pain, improves circulation and is highly recommended. xxoo:-(cf
customer_reviews.author: ChefCheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Way too firm, very uncomfortable as a foot massager
customer_reviews.text: I got the regular density roller as a foot massager a few months ago but it is way too firm. It's extremely uncomfortable to use. The description says the design is mean to feel like someone's fingers massaging, which sounds nice, but it does not feel like that to me at all. Very, very hard and the knobs are too large. Someone gave me a Gaiam Restore Hot & Cold foot roller for Christmas which I like a lot and would highly recommend over this product. Wish I had returned this before the window expired, it is essentially useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Another home by TP
customer_reviews.text: Best foot roller on the market. I also recommend the extra firm. Love TP products. I have tried the wooden ones the hard plastic ones hands down this beats them all
customer_reviews.author: K.Smith

customer_reviews.title: My Feet Love It
customer_reviews.text: When I use this product, it increased the circulation in my feet, which has been an issue for some time. With better circulation, my feet do not hurt as much.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Harucki

customer_reviews.title: Better than a coke bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: I did three months of PT, this works way better than the coke bottle they had me use. It really does work great the knobby construction really breaks up the cross linking in the the facia.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the Trigger Point NANO foot Roller Massager as a Christmas gift for an elderly relative who had been experiencing a burning sensation and cramping in her legs due to circulation challenges. She has not put the massager down since receiving it and has reported less and at times no pain in her legs. I would recommend this item to anyone looking for a good foot massager.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: It does a very good job of keeping my foot loose and flexible
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I was looking for. It does a very good job of keeping my foot loose and flexible. The only reason I do not give it five stars is because I have had use other methods in the past that have been slightly more effective - most notably freezing a water bottle and using that in the same manner as this roller. Good product, though. It's usually impossible to find the right water bottle that will function properly to do what this does.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kilfoyle

customer_reviews.title: Feet feel better than they have in years!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using foam rollers and compression socks to treat my self diagnosed plantar fasciitis and have seen big improvements so far. This is a VERY firm foam so make sure you are prepared for the intensity. I just leave it laying by my front door and roll my feet as soon as I get off work or after the gym. It feels really good and seems really well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stockie

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy, but just doesn’t work for me. I prefer something with an even smooth surface. I think you just have to find what works for you regardless of the ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Missblissful

customer_reviews.title: ... of pressure I can get with the roller is great on my feet
customer_reviews.text: The amount of pressure I can get with the roller is great on my feet, although I do have to move my foot around a few times to get the spot I want as it moves, and it is not really a fluid roll with the massager's size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Grover

customer_reviews.title: closer to pain free
customer_reviews.text: i am in the waning stages of plantar fascia tendonitis. i have done loads of things to treat the issue - stretching, icing, anti-inflammatories, orthotics, cortisone. i ordered this product, hoping it would get me back to a pain free state, and i am very, very close. i also plan to pack this in my suitcase when traveling so that i have an easy tool handy to combat the pain should it resurface. try it!
customer_reviews.author: beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Deep Tissue Massage for Your Feet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome foot massager for deep pressure therapy! I've been using a tennis ball and then a lacrosse ball. This was a great product to dig deep.
customer_reviews.author: Juyao

customer_reviews.title: ... get my toes in a bunch and they get like something of a charlie horse
customer_reviews.text: Some time I get my toes in a bunch and they get like something of a charlie horse, but in my toes. I use this all the time now. Works great for me! Toesies are very happy! Unkinks the muscles. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sooner

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Should Have One
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my old all wood foot roller. I use it almost every day and feel better right away whenever I do.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Downing

customer_reviews.title: Original Foot Log is better, but about 13 inches long (this NANO is about half that)
customer_reviews.text: Little knobby things are spaced too far apart to be as effective as the Original Foot Log (wife had that for her plantar faciitis). I bought this to bring on the road to relax tight muscles contributing to tennis elbow, but it's just not effective.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Did as advertised very well
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but my foot pain is pretty much gone within 2 days. I was struggling to walk for a couple of weeks due to what I think was plantar fasciitis. Wife got tired of me complaining and ordered this for me. It really helped and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER L WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Hard Roll
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for my feet as it is very hard. I usually stand up to get hte most leverage and pressure. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Damian L. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Use it as much as I can.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the extra firm and I love it! I use it on a hardwood floor and it does not hurt at all, but then again, I have a much higher pain tolerance than most so that will depend on the person. It really helps with the pain that comes for me after a long walk or run at the gym. I've gotten to the point where I use it almost everyday just because it feels so amazing to do so. Great product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for your feet problems.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help massage my foot after having plantar fasciitis and it works wonders. After several days of using this after the gym I wasn't bothered with my feet. I also used a ice compress and what not but this saved the day to loosen up my feet. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ringer127

customer_reviews.title: Better than a massage
customer_reviews.text: Roller gave me immediate relief of my plantar fasciitis. It’s easy to use and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: great stretching device for your feet!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's entirely this product's responsibility, but it's definitely helped my foot soreness, possible plantar fascitis. I roll my feet over this and stretch my Achilles tendon every morning and my foot pain has largely gone away. So I'm a believer that a little self therapy goes a long way towards staying pain free in the foot department.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Works
customer_reviews.text: As a pharmacist that stands for 12 hour shifts my feet needed some help at the end of the day. This has drastically improved the overall feeling of my feet and I really couldn't be happier with the ease of use of this product. Sit down to relax and roll your foot over the top of this. Simple and works.
customer_reviews.author: GPharmD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, effective, worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is helping my foot a lot. I trust Trigger Point to know how to make a good roller, and this didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I found if I keep it next to the bed, I MIGHT use it. If I keep it anywhere else, I forget that I own it. It does get away from you if you press too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Bob

customer_reviews.title: OK.......
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made well enough, but I was hoping the nodules would've been a little harder and more "pointy". I wanted something that could dig down into the tissue of my heel to break up any scar tissue, but Im not overly impressed with this rollers capability to do that.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: I like using the rounded ends for the ball of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Started using this as soon as it arrived. It is firm enough to get fairly deep into the arches on my feet and is big enough for someone else to grind it into your feet too. The black ridges have a little bit of give but still quite firm. I like using the rounded ends for the ball of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: RDF

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic roller!
customer_reviews.text: This really works. It looks so simple, but it gives your feet a fantastic pressure point massage. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GenkiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Slip and slide needs more traction!
customer_reviews.text: Well the reason I gave it three stars might be because of my flooring but for those that have hard wood floors or anything slippery? It'll be hard to use this because the plastic bits on the sides slip when you manage to put your foot on the orange (colored).
customer_reviews.author: HermitDash

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for frozen water bottle to roll under foot
customer_reviews.text: We had been using a frozen drink bottle before we bought this for foot pain. Works (and travels) well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is well made and does a good job. It’s definitely relieved physical stress in my feet
customer_reviews.author: Stevie J

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: It has been a good tool to massage my foot to relieve plantar fasciitis. It takes a little getting used to but it has helped to relieve my symptoms
customer_reviews.author: C.L.Meredith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this. Loved their foam roller which prompted me ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Loved their foam roller which prompted me to purchase other items from company! Though i will say a foot massager ball works well too and easier to pack and travel with.
customer_reviews.author: ASILNYC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my feet daily and it has been very helpful for my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: barbara sanchez

customer_reviews.title: worth the extra bucks
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! It's the perfect balance of firm and squishy. It's very firm but not so rigid like the typical wood rollers most people use. I use it before ballet class as I'm a ballet dancer and everyone in the company steals it from me!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great for rolling out all of the tension in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and often have a lot of pain on the underside/arch of my foot. This thing is great for rolling out all of the tension in my feet. The only caveat I have is that it did make marks in my hardwood floor, so I have to use it on carpet - but that may have more to do with my floor than the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful foot roller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. a GREAT tool to loosen up those tense foot muscles. You have no idea how tight those are til you use something like this. Great relief!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Its very easy to.put in ur carry on baggage In lap top case & travel with
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Beats a Soup Can Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: Great roller for various foot/achilles issues. I was using a soup can and that wasn't working out so well. Glad I spent the $$ for this item. Also, glad I got the Extra Firm density. Anything else would have been too soft IMO.
customer_reviews.author: J. Owens

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect device to use when my feet are in pain. At my job I stand up all day long in a hospital, so using this to help break up any lactic acid build up is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love all my Trigger Point massagers, they're made of good quality materials that will last for years. I use this massager almost everyday when I get home from work. I am on my feet a lot and this soothes my feet by providing a great massage...
customer_reviews.author: Dunamis

customer_reviews.title: Not Useful For Me
customer_reviews.text: This was not useful to me - I needed something that would apply pressure all the way around the roller.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few different foot rollers to help with my Plantar Fasciitis and this one is pretty soft and doesn't really help that much. You may find it worthwhile, but I need something a little harder and this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Sparksongs

customer_reviews.title: I also have the Due North Foot Rubz which I think works a lot better for my plantar fasciitis because I am able to ...
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works to get a bit of a stretch, however the regular density is a little too squishy for me. I also have the Due North Foot Rubz which I think works a lot better for my plantar fasciitis because I am able to manipulate my foot around the small ball where with this roller I am pretty limited in the angle of my rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this after a day of work. Feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for foot muscle relief. Use it in the office, watching TV etc.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foot massaging roller
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size, firmness, and texture for my very tender feet. I'm using the roller to help gently treat plantar fasciitis and keep my feet as flexible as possible with severe rheumatoid disease.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: amazing tool, a must for anyone who values their ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing tool, a must for anyone who values their arches. even good for lower calf/ankle. Even used the plastic wheel portion to dig into my hamstrings when they're tight. compact & ideal for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheaper to use a dowel rod, or the barbell at your gym.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Significantly helped my foot heal and allowed me to continue to train.
customer_reviews.author: T. Braun

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to roll your foot
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient, efficient way of rolling your feet. I roll my foot before I get out of bed and periodically during the day. I got the extra firm and I probably should have gotten the regular. Nonetheless, its a useful tool.
customer_reviews.author: PB Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller. I'm just starting to run and as my body gets used to it I spend a lot of time rolling various parts. My husband is a cyclist and he's liking this as well. I'm thinking about buying the extra firm too.
customer_reviews.author: LEdwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After 8 hours of retail working - this really helps with the discomfort in my feet
customer_reviews.author: Sue W

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and painful
customer_reviews.text: Don't recommend. Very hard and the nubs are too far apart. Instead of working the muscles in my feet, my foot just rolls over a row of nubs and then slams flat, then rolls over the next row. It needs about twice as many rows or smaller nubs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to my existing roller
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for my tired feet after running, volleyball, and CrossFit. Good addition to my existing roller.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Feet
customer_reviews.text: Great works fantastic on your pronated feet!!! Easy to use! Durable
customer_reviews.author: traceycv

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for heal pain!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it to help maintain heal pain from heal spurs. He says he loves this roller and that it feels really good when he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: T.V.

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You might try the softer version, even though they say not much difference...
customer_reviews.author: SkyGodSam

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is great!! After a workout, don't forget to stretch your feet!! I pop this in my purse when my toes or feet hurt after too much Zumba. Then I can use it under my desk during my lunch break.
customer_reviews.author: Deeno

customer_reviews.title: so-so
customer_reviews.text: This is ok but it has to be used on carpet or on a rug. I have FlexFixx balls which I much prefer to this. I think you would need a TriggerPoint for each foot.
customer_reviews.author: mommaZ

customer_reviews.title: Good little product for tired feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought fo rmy wife who has foot issues and she likes it and uses it quite a bit so Im happy
customer_reviews.author: apples

customer_reviews.title: Great after a hike, long walk, long time on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of rollers for my legs and back. This does a great job on the foot. I also use the R3 product from Roll Recovery. The two together are great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my plantar fascia which hurts every morning when I am running daily
customer_reviews.author: A. Buschbach

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So much better than using a tennis ball! As with everything, it only works if you use it, but this little gadget really will make your tired and achy feet feel better, especially if you have plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Effective in providing relieve. But looks really simple to ...
customer_reviews.text: Effective in providing relieve. But looks really simple to manufacture, try looking for cheaper / cost effective alternatives. They will probably give the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Goh

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Maybe smaller points on roller would feel better. It's probably more quiet than the wooden rollers
customer_reviews.author: sc lc

customer_reviews.title: Love that it not spiky
customer_reviews.text: Love that it not spiky. The blunt knobs make it great to use especially on the feet. You don't feel like to are going to hurt yourself
customer_reviews.author: Linda Erb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solidly made and does exactly what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: KyKSD

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Massager Ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best foot massager I ever purchased. Well made and worth the money. I always have pain in my feet especially in my arches and this helps so much! Would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cyrstal Carter

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on my foot
customer_reviews.text: I find myself using this while watching TV and chilling out. Feels great on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jory Johner

customer_reviews.title: Great little roller.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Wife likes it more then her tennis ball. I use it for general rolling, she targets her plantar faciatis and says it works great. Not badly priced and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome after trade shows or hiking trips!
customer_reviews.text: Great for after hiking and easy to use. Stiffer strength is better if you're looking to really target muscles.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: Keep feet healthy
customer_reviews.text: Use the trigger Point daily after my morning jog. It really helps relieve any sore spots or tight areas on the bottom of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like it, have not used it much but so far so good, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is the most helpful foot roller, for plantar fasciitis, which I have found. Extremely effective.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Helped my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product to release the tension in your feet from plantar fasciitis. I used it regularly and helped me.
customer_reviews.author: AndRoo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, uses it often. Would recommend that you buy the black extra firm unit. This one does not give much but still a wonderful item!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - nerve injury
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have a nerve injury that doesn't allow me to move my foot, so I suffer some pain. By using the roller I improve the blood circulation to my foot and the pain decreases significantly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Felt great on my sore feet and relieved me of some minor pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Avin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing it has helped with my foot pain like nobody's business
customer_reviews.author: Cjarr

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Make my feet feel good on days they are hurting!
customer_reviews.author: Marti S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of equipment to relieve foot pain.
customer_reviews.text: Helps plantar Fascitis. Gives foot relief. This is very stiff compared to the orange one.
customer_reviews.author: Serdood

customer_reviews.title: ... wife who has plantar fasciitis and complained of very painful feet every day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who has plantar fasciitis and complained of very painful feet every day. After only one use, pain 90% gone. Repeat as needed every day.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Healy

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot - easy to use and makes my foot feel better
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot - easy to use and makes my foot feel better
customer_reviews.author: suziq24

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for forearms/tricep massage
customer_reviews.text: I love foam rollers. I don't know if I'm particularly prone to muscle knots or what, but now that I have them, I can't live without them. This roller I actually got for its intended purpose--feet. It works pretty well for that purpose, although you could definitely get away with a lacrosse ball instead. But the real usefulness of this roller is for forearms and triceps. You just can't get the same leverage or pressure with the bigger rollers or lacrosse/tennis balls. If you have wrist or arm pain, you can't afford not to pick up one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Janus

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's under my bathroom sink so I don't forget to use it while brushing my teeth. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: zita feher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy using this on my feet. It truly hits the pressure points and relieves pain or tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Dydie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for plantar faciitis!
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar faciitis and this product really helps to relieve the pain and got me up and walking again!
customer_reviews.author: Michele J. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Foot Roller
customer_reviews.text: If you are on your on the move all day and come home with sore feet. This great right after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Silverio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I run often and have had problems with plantar fasciitis. I use this roller often and it helps tremendously. Small, simple to use and built great. I have purchased this for my family members as well to help them stretch their feet after a long day. A bit on the stiffer side but I like that about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great foot roller to massage the bottom of your feet.
customer_reviews.author: AlvinNTX

product_meta.title: TriggerPoint NANO Foot Roller Massager
product_meta.description: The TriggerPoint NANO Foot Roller is an innovative foam roller specifically designed to increase flexibility in the foot and relieve minor muscular aches and pains associated with the foot. Designed to mirror the feeling of a massage therapist's fingertips, the NANO is supported by our educational platform that is recognized globally for its effectiveness in the application of myofascial release. Available in two densities - regular and extra dense (X). One year manufacturer's warranty. 6.5 x 2.75 x 2.75 inches, weight 8 oz.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and portable size is convenient for the gym, office or on the road
Dense foam surface helps channel blood directly to the tissue for health and mobility
Designed specifically to replicate the feeling of a massage therapist's finger tips
Available in two densities, regular and extra firm (X)
